name: Bramble Turtle
text_description: The Bramble Turtle, a guardian of the forest, bolsters its allies' resilience. When Bramble Turtle is in play, all other Nature type cards gain +2 defense.
illustration_description: A sturdy turtle covered in vines and flowers trudges forward on a forest path, a determined look in its eyes. It carries a large shell, teeming with life, small plants and moss growing on it. The background is a lush green forest bathed in soft sunlight filtering through the trees.
